alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Monroe and eastern Lenawee Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Livonia to near Saline to near Grass Lake. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Milan around 610 PM EDT. Tecumseh around 620 PM EDT. Adrian, Flat Rock, Dundee, Trenton and Maybee around 625 PM EDT. Carleton and Petersburg around 630 PM EDT. Ida around 635 PM EDT. Monroe and Blissfield around 640 PM EDT. Temperance, Luna Pier and Lambertville around 645 PM EDT. Ottawa Lake around 650 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Newport, Cone, Macon, Estral Beach, Ogden Center, Toledo Beach, Erie, South Rockwood, Woodland Beach and Stony Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
